welcome.subTitle: Let's improve your language skills!
welcome.note: Please note, Loquela is not a substitute for a teacher. It's a practice tool designed to help you improve various language skills through different types of exercises.

home.quote: “Learning another language is not only learning different words for the same things, but learning another way to think about things.”
home.author: Flora Lewis

aiPages.noteHide: Note: You can hide these details by clicking the question mark next to the heading.
aiPages.noteRestart: Note: If you want to practice more, simply press the start exercise button again.

support.title: Support
support.text1: If you have any additional questions, please do not hesitate to contact the developer via email at
support.text2: . We are here to help and ensure you have the best learning experience with Loquela.
